divs: sighting detailswe were coming back home from concord. we were shopping in cost plus world market at 8:38pm. my daughter was driving in the freeway, and that space was surrounded with buildings, when i noticed a very sharp lights of an aircraft...was very big for a normal aircraft...i did not think was unsual, just cough my attention (i used to be a civil pilot in 1978), when we were close... i said: what is that! at first i thought was an helicopter a big one...but was no peculiar sound, and was stationary in the air, the shape was rectangular and big. what make me think that this was and unusual aircraft, was that when we were approaching has light all over the edges of the bottom part of the object and a red flash light on the end. i told my daughter did you see that?... what, what?...she could not see anything because she was concentrated on the freeway driving, and we could not stop. i am not updated in aviation, i never in my live saw any ufo, just one day flying close to the beach in my country, i notices big round foot on the sand , 3 of them in a perfect triangle shape, and my co-pilot friend pilot also saw it...is the nearest sighting i had experienced. we were at 1500 feets hight. what was that a new type of helicopter? we are surrounded of airdromes, is a too public space. i do not know... was unusual to me... i had to know! when i came back home i start to check in the internet, and immediately pop up this link: http:\\www.examiner.com\x-2363-ufo-examiner~y2010m3d26-rectangle-ufo-hovers-low-over-i15-near-riverside-ca. was like i was telling the same story! too strange!
trends: There have been 20 other sightings in Concord
There were no other sightings in Concord on or around May 20th 2010
